function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of the virus through respiratory droplets released via coughs and sneezes.","Impact":"Spread of the virus within the built environment, leading to increased infection rates.","Mitigation":"Use of face masks, maintaining physical distancing, and improving indoor ventilation systems.","Technologies":"Air purifiers, UV disinfection, and HEPA filters.","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and healthcare workers.","Owner":"Building managers, public health authorities."},{"Description":"Longevity of the virus on different surfaces, increasing the risk of indirect transmission through touch.","Impact":"Potential for contamination of frequently-touched surfaces and subsequent transmission to individuals.","Mitigation":"Frequent disinfection of surfaces, promoting hand hygiene, and use of antimicrobial materials for high-touch surfaces.","Technologies":"Antimicrobial coatings, self-disinfecting surfaces, and touchless technologies.","People":"Janitorial staff, facility maintenance personnel, and occupants.","Owner":"Building managers, facility maintenance teams."},{"Description":"Asymptomatic spread of the virus before symptoms appear, leading to undetected transmission.","Impact":"Unrecognized transmission of the virus within the built environment, contributing to outbreaks.","Mitigation":"Regular testing, symptom screening, and promoting awareness of asymptomatic transmission.","Technologies":"Rapid antigen tests, temperature screening devices, and occupancy monitoring systems.","People":"Occupants, visitors, and healthcare workers.","Owner":"Public health authorities, building managers, and employers."}]}
